issue.title: [Rust] Generate code using Flatbuffers
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2467](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2467). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Generate flatbuffers code for Schema, File, Message, and Tensor and add to project. It would be nice to generate on the fly as part of the build process but this doesn't seem feasible today because:
 \* We would have to download and compile Flatbuffers first
 \* The Rust implementation of Flatbuffers has a couple minor issues that required manually fixing the generated code

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2467?focusedCommentId=16812342) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4021
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4021>
